_header: Of these sayings Christine was auctoress
Author(s): Anthony Wydeville (earl Rivers); Christine de Pisan
_description: Caxton’s epilogue to Earl Rivers’ translation of Du Castel, Christine [i.e., Christine de Pisan], The morale prouerbes of Cristyne, [London]: Enprinted by Caxton, [1478] — two stanzas rhyme royal
